020    package com.craftfire.commons.cache;
021    
022    public class CacheItem {
023        private final int time, cacheTime;
024        private final Object id, object;
025        
026        public CacheItem(Object id, int cacheTime, Object object) {
027            this.id = id;
028            this.time = (int) System.currentTimeMillis() / 1000;
029            this.cacheTime = cacheTime;
030            this.object = object;
031        }
032    
033        /**
034         * Returns the ID of the cache item.
035         *
036         * @return ID of the cache item
037         */
038        public Object getID() {
039            return this.id;
040        }
041    
042        /**
043         * Returns the UNIX time when the cache was created.
044         *
045         * @return The time in UNIX of when the cache was created
046         */
047        public int getTimeAdded() {
048            return this.time;
049        }
050    
051        /**
052         * Returns the amount of seconds left on the cache.
053         *
054         * @return Seconds left
055         */
056        public int getSecondsLeft() {
057            return (int) ((System.currentTimeMillis() / 1000) - this.time - this.cacheTime);
058        }
059        
060        public int getCacheTime() {
061            return this.cacheTime;
062        }
063        
064        public Object getObject() {
065            return this.object;
066        }
067    }
